title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt
description: Author Alan Sepinwall talks to series co-creator Peter Gould in this excerpt from The Complete Critical Companion To Better Call Saul. The post Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt appeared first on AV Club.
author: Jen Lennon

title: Dexter: Resurrection’s Michael C. Hall and Krysten Ritter Detail Killer Dinner Party, Dexter and Mia’s Instant Connection — Watch
description: Who would’ve thought that Dexter Morgan could be a social butterfly? In Episode 4 of Dexter: Resurrection, Dexter infiltrates a luxurious dinner party while under cover as Ronald “Red” Schmidt, aka the Dark Passenger. After being picked up by Uma Thurman’s Charley, he arrives at the beautiful estate of Leon Prater (Peter Dinklage), a man […]
author: Nick Caruso

title: Gen V Season 2 Trailer Reveals Ethan Slater’s Casting, Starlight’s Mission for Marie and a Chance Perdomo Tribute
description: A familiar face is welcoming Gen V back to Prime Video for its long-awaited second season, premiering on Wednesday, Sept. 17 with the first three episodes. As just revealed at San Diego Comic-Con, the trailer for Season 2 kicks off with Starlight (The Boys’ Erin Moriarty) turning to Marie Moreau (Jaz Sinclair) for help. Vought […]
author: Andy Swift

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
